title: Exporting from Thunderbird WITHOUT MESSAGES
content:
I need to migrate from one machine to another, but I have 6 email accounts, and the zipped data file produced by the export tool is 27 GB! All of my email is on IMAP servers, so I don't actually need the email, but I need everything else.

How can I just export everything but the actual emails themselves?
creator: edcarp

title: what happened to word wrapping when writing an email?
content:
You changed my Thunderbird last night and now when I type an email to send, the words just keep going right off the side of the box. This can not continue!

What happened to word wrapping of my text? How do I fix this?

Also why on earth are there now big gray ovals over every number next to the different folders?

I want the last version BACK!
creator: gendig

title: Unable to read emails
content: Have been unable to read my emails for sometime. Just put in my username & password but not accepted.
creator: jan.norwell

title: A list of my issues with 115
content:
Hi, I have been a grateful and happy user of TB for over a decade.

Then TB updated to 115.

I posted about it taking a long time to start up when using Unified folders, and this was fixed by me doing a clean install of 115 which took me a half day. However it still takes much longer to start up than previous versions to 115.

I still have the issues that I posted about: - Inbox displays incorrect number of messages - Issues with forwarded messages that also happen when using Unified folders. So I dont use Unified folders.

I now also have the issues (that I have not posted about): - Sometimes TB shows an empty message with a date of year 1969 - Sometimes when I compose a new message, which opens a new window, and then I switch out of that window back to the window that has Thunderbird in it, the new message window just disappears, along with the contents I have typed into it. Poof.

With TB pre-115, I always felt it was stable and reliable and had few issues over the years.

With 115 I now feel there are many issues, that I dont have time to dig into, or post about.

If I am using Firefox and I click "Email a link of this page" in TB, first the main TB application opens, and then a new separate window opens with a new message that contains the info of this page. In previous versions, the main TB application did not first open, just a TB new message window would open. This was much faster than what 115 does.

I have a number of email accounts in TB and I cannot use Unified folders, so I have to check the Inbox and other folders of each account separately.

I would install the Unified Folders Debugging 115.3 addon but I noticed it gives a warning before install that says it will have access to my whole computer, and my company's security policy will not allow installing based on this warning.
creator: hiker11

title: after click searh result will still come multi messge
content: Thunderbird updte to 115.4.2. when search attachment file name will list out multi email, also the result will display other email not base on search context. If click the search result, it will open other windows, but the window not display single email , which display all message with same same subject.

title: Email cannot be opened and sometimes messages reappear as unread
content:
We recently encountered that our Thunderbird installations cannot open email and if they do, the messages reappear as unread even after they are read.

On one PC, new messages do not even load anymore.

Our installations are all on PC if this helps any. We don't think it's with the email accounts as our Mail on our Macs act normally.

Please help.

Thanks.
creator: randytan01

title: Taking forever to download my Shaw e-mails which arrive corrupted
content: For last week it takes forever to download my e-mails and system oten crashes. Then won't let me open the messages, they are blank and it looses them. What can I do to overcome such Regards, Roland

title: E mails cannot be sent and received
content: I have Avira prime installed . If I switch on the VPN of Avira, I can no longer send nor receive Emails . Avira de - installation and re-installattion did not help. Any suggestions?
creator: eoy

title: Transferring emails between providers
content: I am currently with IINET in Australia and they are getting out of the email game. They are transferring us to a messenger service. It's not supposed to happen for a while but my IINET emails have stopped working and IINET are blaming Thunderbird (for which they have (no control). Receiving 'help' today, I have now lost my Inbox of emails but my main concern that my folders (on the side) have not been migrated nor does anyone from either organisation know how to affect this! Over the past 6 weeks sending, relying or forwarding emails has been haphazard as to the ability to do any of those. Any ideas how to right the ship? Thank you
creator: dholyoak

title: Změna ikony aplikace
content: Dobrý den, mám Thunderbird na hlavní liště, má ikonu Domek. Po spuštění do doručené pošty se ikona změní na nějakou modrou hrůzu, která se bije s modrou hrůzou od Outlooku. Naprosto nechápu, proč se ta ikona mění z domku na něco jiného? Kde se to dá změnit? Stalo se to nejspáš po poslední větší aktualizaci. S pozdravem Milan Šeliga
creator: mi.seliga

title: Importare solo parte di email da vecchio profilo
content: Ciao a tutti, dopo diversi tentativi d'installazione di Thunderbird 115 da uno dei vecchi profili tenuti come backup, vorrei reimportare da altri vecchi profili solo una parte di email per integrarle e mantenerle in thunderbird. E' possibile entrare nella cartella d'installazione e importare selezionandole solo alcune email da me scelte? se si in quale cartella le trovo e come posso importarle? Premetto che ho più di un account email di vari provider e vorrei fare questa operazione per poi fare un backup di tutti per poi in futuro non dovere stare a ricercarle nuovamente. Grazie in anticipo a chi mi risponderà.
creator: massimosavaris

title: Opzione/componente aggiuntivo per TB per segnare in automatico come letti i messaggi che si cancellano dalla posta in arrivo senza averli prima aperti (TB v. 115.4.3  - 64 bit Windows)
content: Buongiorno e grazie fin d'ora per l'attenzione. Il mio - modesto - problema è questo: esiste in TB (v. 115.4.3 - 64 bit Windows) un'opzione/componente aggiuntivo per far segnare in automatico come letti i messaggi che si vanno a cancellare dalla posta in arrivo senza averli prima aperti ? Sono convinto che nelle versioni di TB di qualche tempo fa ci fosse un'opzione che consentiva di impostare un simile meccanismo, ma ora non riesco più a trovarla nelle impostazioni. Ho anche provato a fare una ricerca nella KB, ma senza successo. Per questo chiedo se qualcuno ha qualche notizia/suggerimento al riguardo. Ancora grazie. Federico Oliosi
creator: foliosi

title: issue with saving email on desktop
content: Hello, I am trying to save an email to my desktop and the save button is unavailable. If I shorten the file name the save button becomes available. Is there a characters limit for file names? Is there a work around to this issue? I should not alter the file name since it's a work document. Thank you
